entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023
